Package simpletask.entities

Interface Workspace

All Known Implementing Classes:
Action, Task
public interface Workspace
An interface used by all task classes. A workspace is anywhere that stores data for tasks. This may just be a list of tasks or a simple action. NOTE: At the moment, all methods have default privilages but some will need to be changed to public.
See Also:
Task, Action

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Workspace createWorkspace​(java.lang.String name)
    Used to create a new workspace.
    boolean flipCompletionStatus()
    Used to flip the completion status of the workspace.
    java.lang.String getName()
    Used to get name of workspace.
    Workspace getParent()
    Returns the parent of the current workspace.
    java.util.ArrayList<Workspace> getTasks()
    Used to get a list of tasks in current workspace.
    boolean isWorkspaceComplete()
    Used to check if current workspace is complete.
    void setParent​(Workspace parent)
    Used to set the parent of the current workspace.

  • Method Details

    • isWorkspaceComplete

      boolean isWorkspaceComplete()
      Used to check if current workspace is complete.
      Returns:
      True if workspace is complete, fasle otherwise

    • flipCompletionStatus

      boolean flipCompletionStatus()
      Used to flip the completion status of the workspace.
      Returns:
      True if workspace is complete, false otherwise.

    • createWorkspace

      Workspace createWorkspace​(java.lang.String name)
      Used to create a new workspace.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of new workspace
      Returns:
      The newly created workspace

    • getName

      java.lang.String getName()
      Used to get name of workspace.
      Returns:
      Name of workspace

    • getTasks

      java.util.ArrayList<Workspace> getTasks()
      Used to get a list of tasks in current workspace.
      Returns:
      An array list of tasks in workspaces

    • setParent

      void setParent​(Workspace parent)
      Used to set the parent of the current workspace. As of now, the parent of a workspace, is the workspace it was created in.
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent of this workspace.

    • getParent

      Workspace getParent()
      Returns the parent of the current workspace.
      Returns:
      Parent of current workspace
